entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as one of the inventors of Extendable Ears. He had to hide them from his mother.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as one of the inventors of Extendable Ears. He had to hide them from his mother.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry's face is described as looking concerned when he sees the Extendable Ears.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as showing Harry the Extendable Ears and explaining their usefulness.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as providing additional information about the Order of Death Eaters.

entities.name: extendable ears
entities.description: Extendable Ears are a device invented by Fred and George that allows them to listen in on conversations remotely.

relationships.description: Fred and George collaborated to invent Extendable Ears.
Ron is showing Harry the Extendable Ears that he has possession of.
Hermione is providing information about the Order of Death Eaters.
